column5: My place Overlooks The Comal River! You have a river view from living room, master bedroom & patio.  Schlitterbahn. Across the street! Close to Landa Park, Gruene & Guadalupe River.  , restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, nightlife. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.
column8: The Redneck River Ranch w/Comal River View!
